title: Share of U.S. travelers who have had items stolen or lost 2015
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
The Share of respondents of Response Passport is 2.5% smaller than the maximum value at Smartphone.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
Response Smartphone has the highest Share of respondents and Passport has the lowest Share of respondents.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 6.0.
